channel.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
channel.description:
![ModernPrince|690x359](upload://cTklyxuFr8Xe8iX6lNSR5U4MGHT.jpeg)
Please. Tell me this is a terrible buff.
(Just so you know. I hide information for evils in the right side of my book. Perhaps this will help the boy)

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
I think Prince right now needs a rework rather than a buff.
The only thing Prince has going for it right now is an unconvertable, empowered, provable Knight that occupies. That isn’t fun in the slightest. What is the point of jailing someone if everyone posts their logs anyways in day chat?

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I’m calling it now. ToL will have FoL style limited feedback by 2020 or at least very close to it

For example physician might still get feedback but not their target.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I’m sure we will need it EVENTUALLY.

We have been gradually heading in that direction with ToL

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
i’m just noting things down for my Great Ego Rework

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
@Icibalus something like this?

Prince

Blue Dragon
Passive: Royal blood - Votes on you for king count twice

Day Ability: Unstoppable - You are immune to occupy and redirection tonight and Behead bypasses everything tonight (1 use)

Night Ability 1: Imprison - If target player tries to visit anyone occupy them. Occupy anyone visiting target player (4 uses)
Night Ability 2: Behead - Kill and occupy target player. If you kill a BD this way then disable this ability (3 uses)

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Non-confirmable offensive is kinda not a thing given the base mechanics we have at the moment

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Something along the lines of an actual jailkeeper maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
oh my god

is someone seriously saying prince is BORING and that’s a valid reason to disregard balance and BUFF him for no reason?

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Prince could be remade as a non-confirmable offensive or a JOAT of some kind, which would likewise fix the problem of K/O being an asinine group to claim in.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
like Mystic always has and always will fit the bill
it’s not as obscenely strong or limiting as Prince, it has cool abilities, there are many different strategies you can do with it, and most of all it’s nowhere near as strong

I’d be perfectly willing to go forward with Mystic as the central design element rather than Prince.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Or we just remake Prince.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
…Mystic.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Even if you got rid of
Prince, we’d still need a confirmed BD.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: SabreOverdrive
item.description:
Same thing I feel for prince and phys

“Do this [class]” or “you know what to do”

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
That’s not because it’s too weak, or that it’s not receiving investigative results. Neccecarily, you’re getting new info each night.

The reason I’ve seen people think Prince is boring is actually because almost all of Prince’s power comes from it just existing and going by the numbers, occasionally killing a lock wolf or a shudders Fool or two, rather than being allowed to make any remotely ambitious plays.

In other words, it’s because Prince is too strong.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: SabreOverdrive
item.description:
Still. Prince is just too boring at times.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
The point is that you’re buffing a role that needs to be nerfed simply for design health by giving it something that just annoys wolves with particular habits and causes people to lose through the game suddenly making their habits a method of losing the game, which is objectively bad design.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
So what? I’ve seen many many wolves who put two logs in their logbooks for different scenarios, and all this ability does is force those wolves to change their habits. It dosen’t actually impact the balance of the game much beyond that.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: SabreOverdrive
item.description:
Private notes pal…

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
The problem is that Prince already has this ability, and the fact that you’ve codified it as an ability does nothing but remove the wolves’ ability to place multiple logs in their logbook without sacrificing the right side of it, which is more annoying than useful.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: SabreOverdrive
item.description:
Most times I play unseen/cult win

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: SabreOverdrive
item.description:
If i can say. Prince is very important. If we remove him. Bd will not stand a chance. Giving him this night ability. Might be helpful depending on situation

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
If we remove Prince then we can move the power he once had and redistribute it amongst the other BD, most notably by buffing Princess and Physician.

I’m not saying we can just give the game a Subregulusectomy and then leave it at that, but if the game was redesigned slighty to not be balanced entirely around the BD keeping the Prince alive it would open huge amounts of design space.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
Winrates.
That’s why.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to stop. (prince buff)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
But what if we removed Prince and stopped having an absolutely confirmable overpowered role in the game? Just food for thought.

It’d make balancing the game a way easier job, that’s for sure.

Read full topic
